speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me when you first noticed the yellow discoloration of your eyes and skin? Was it after birth or did it start a few days ago?

speaker: Patient
text: "It started a few days ago, after I was born. I remember my mother saying I had a bit of a jaundice look on my face when she was holding me, but it wasn't too noticeable."

speaker: Doctor
text: When was the first time you started noticing this yellow discoloration, was it immediately after birth or did it start to develop a few days after?

speaker: Patient
text: "It started a few days after, actually. I remember my mom saying it was a bit more noticeable on my face, and it seemed to be getting worse, but I wasn't really paying attention at first."

speaker: Doctor
text: When did the discoloration first appear to you, did it start as a tiny yellow tint or was it more pronounced from the beginning?

speaker: Patient
text: "I think it started as a tiny yellow tint, but it quickly became more noticeable, especially on my face. My mom said it was a bit more yellow on my skin than my eyes at first, but it's gotten worse and now it's more yellow on my eyes too."

speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me more about the color of the discoloration? Is it a light yellow, golden yellow, or more of a darker, olive-like color?

speaker: Patient
text: "It's more of a golden yellow, but it's getting darker, especially on my skin. It's starting to spread and I think it's getting harder to see the whites of my eyes now."

speaker: Doctor
text:
When did the discoloration start to spread to other parts of the body, like the ears, lips, and tongue?



Also, has the newborn been taking any medications or supplements, and are there any family members with similar symptoms?



Can you show me the color of the discoloration on the inside of the eyelids?

text:

- The discoloration started spreading to other parts of the body, such as the ears, lips, and tongue, approximately 3 days after the initial onset of jaundice.

- There are no reported family members with similar symptoms.
- The color of the discoloration on the inside of the eyelids is yellowish-brown.
